summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS 2009 KTM 250 XCF MOTORCYCLE.  THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING 30 MPH WHEN THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FLY WHEEL WEIGHT FRACTURED AND SMALL BITS HAD ENTERED INTO THE ENGINE, CAUSING THE FAILURE. THE ENGINE WAS REPAIRED. THE CONTACT BELIEVED THAT THE FLY WHEEL WAS MANUFACTURER WITH FAULTY MATERIAL. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 4,000.  THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
